ai-patthana16.63:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.63:1.1_0: One who is not committed to defilement
ai-patthana16.63:1.1_1: One who is not committed to defilement
ai-patthana16.63:1.1_2: One whose defilements are ended, not committed to defilement, straying the principle of defiled, and not completely understanding the teachings.
ai-patthana16.63:2.1_0: Qualities for lack of focusing on the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom, the stopped by not grasping.
ai-patthana16.63:2.1_1: One who has improperly comprehended the principle of defiledment, doesn’t completely understand the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life, and a cause of corruption.
